meta.description: CSH for Pages table (additional fields of this extension)

languageKey.label: This is an alternative pagetitel which is used by the metaext titletag generator. This will be prefered over the usage of subtitle and title, if set.

You can enter a page specific copyright information here. if configured via constants, the metatag <meta name="copyright" value="the value you are entering here" /> will be displayed on the html output of this page. A value entered here overrides any global setting if made. The copyright metatag will only be displayed on your page, if configured with the constant editor in the section [METATAGS]
publisher

importance for sitemap
